TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/ExplorerBar/NormalGroupCollapse extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the collapse button of a common group of items in the Explorer Bar. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the VisualStyleElement.ExplorerBar.NormalGroupCollapse class gets a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the collapse button of a common group of items in the Explorer Bar, such as the **File and Folder Tasks** group in Windows Explorer.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ExplorerBar.NormalGroupCollapse.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarNormalGroupCollapse1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#151](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/c74ecd33-5224-4c36-994a-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#151](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/c74ecd33-5224-4c36-994a-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a hot collapse button of a common group of items in the Explorer Bar.
Docs.value: A that represents a hot collapse button.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Hot property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Hot property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarNormalGroupCollapse2` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#152](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/fcb1d7e3-299b-41a3-a975-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#152](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/fcb1d7e3-299b-41a3-a975-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a normal collapse button of a common group of items in the Explorer Bar.
Docs.value: A that represents a normal collapse button.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarNormalGroupCollapse1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a pressed collapse button of a common group of items in the Explorer Bar.
Docs.value: A that represents a pressed collapse button.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Pressed property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Pressed property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementExplorerBarNormalGroupCollapse3` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
